mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EVENT(event_num, event_title, event_content, start_date, end_date, is_active, created_date, update_date, state)
mapper.select: SELECT e.user_num, event_num, event_title, event_content, start_date, end_date, is_active, created_date, update_date, state FROM EVENT e JOIN MEMBER m ON e.user_num = m.user_num;
